what.title: What is FomoFactory?
what.content: FomoFactory is a platform that allows you to deploy a token contract, set up a Uniswap V3 liquidity pool, lock liquidity and optionally perform the first buy, all with a single click

how.title: How does FomoFactory work?
how.content:
With just one click, our portal: 
	1. Deploys a token contract
	2. Sets up a Uniswap V3 liquidity pool
	3. Locks the liquidity
	4. Optionally performs the first buy to secure a portion of tokens for the creator and prevent sniping

ownership.title: Is there any ownership associated with the token contract by default?
ownership.content: No, by default, the token does not have any owners. This ensures the token appears clean on DEX tools

tokenomics.title: What is the tokenomics of the token?
tokenomics.content: The initial market cap of the token is set at $10K. The token launch is a fair launch with 100% of the tokens locked in a liquidity pool

optionalBuy.title: What is the optional first buy feature?
optionalBuy.content: The optional first buy secures a portion of tokens for the creator, prevents sniping and makes the token discoverable by DEX tools

fees.title: What are the fees associated with using FomoFactory?
fees.content: There is a flat fee of $10 for launching a token. Additionally, a 30% fee is charged on claimed Uniswap fees
